name: Planetary Adaptation
text: This spell functions as planar adaptation (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player’s Guide 236), except that it works only on worlds of the Material Plane. The cold void of space is considered a single world for the purpose of this spell, allowing you to survive in vacuum.
text_zh: 此法术如同位面适应(planar adaptation，APG P.236)般作用，除了它只能用在主物质位面世界。在决定法术的目标时，寒冷虚空的太空被认为是一个世界，令你可以在真空中生存。
